title: Kill Kagha
content:
Tips

Similar to stealing the Idol of Silvanus, the dialogue option given by this quest instantly makes many Druid-aligned NPCs hostile to both the party and all of the Tiefling NPCs. They will begin killing each other in real time across all of the Druid Grove while you are locked in turn-based combat with Kagha unless the party splits up.
